citations.narrative:
The following general housekeeping issues were noted during the inspection of the animal housing room. There were
bedding shavings present on the floor and on the shelves, the shelves and the husbandry items kept/stored in the housing
room had a coating of dust and particulate matter, and there were cobwebs on several of the shelves and on the ceiling.
Per this Section, premises housing animals shall be kept clean to facilitate the prescribed husbandry practices and to
protect the health of the animals. The housing room needs to be cleaned and the level of housekeeping in this area needs
to be improved. Correct by 8/31/23.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with Licensee.
*END OF REPORT*
n

narrative:
3.131(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
The following general housekeeping issues were noted during the inspection of the animal housing room. There were 
bedding shavings present on the floor and on the shelves, the shelves and the husbandry items kept/stored in the housing 
room had a coating of dust and particulate matter, and there were cobwebs on several of the shelves and on the ceiling. 
 
Per this Section, premises housing animals shall be kept clean to facilitate the prescribed husbandry practices and to 
protect the health of the animals. The housing room needs to be cleaned and the level of housekeeping in this area needs 
to be improved. Correct by 8/31/23. 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with Licensee. 
 
*END OF REPORT* 
 
 n
